posts._title: Ming Zhang – Wu shan yun yu aka Rainclouds over Wushan (1996)
posts.title: Wu shan yun yu
posts.excerpt: Interlocking episodes and a bemused, deadpan vision shape the Chinese film ”Rain Clouds Over Wushan,” which is directed with quirky promise and dry precision by Zhang Ming. Mr. Zhang echoes Jim Jarmusch with his bare, quotidian settings and with characters whose quiet desperation can give way to surprising flashes of tenderness and sly, tacit wit. …

posts._title: Lav Diaz – Norte, Hangganan Ng Kasaysayan AKA Norte the End of History (2013)
posts.title: Norte, Hangganan Ng Kasaysayan
posts.excerpt: Synopsis: An embittered law student commits a brutal double murder; a family man takes the fall and is forced into a harsh prison sentence; a mother and her two children wander the countryside looking for some kind of redemption.

posts.title: Gerontophilia
posts.excerpt: Lake is an unusual boy: he is a young man with an old soul who discovers he has an odd fixation on the elderly. Realizing that some day, if fate allows, he will be one himself, he is particularly fascinated by old men. He imagines their age to be a beautiful thing and recognizes how …

posts._title: Dominik Graf – Die reichen Leichen. Ein Starnbergkrimi (2014)
posts.title: Die reichen Leichen Ein Starnbergkrimi
posts.excerpt: German plot description: Quote: Polizeimeisteranwärterin Ariane Fink aus Dortmund verschlägt es ausgerechnet nach Starnberg: gesichtsloses Städtchen, Wahnsinnssee. Höchste Millionärsdichte Bayerns. Eine Idylle mit Reißzähnen. Und eben hier wird Ariane gleich an ihrem ersten Arbeitstag mit dem bayerischsten aller Klischees konfrontiert: Der tote Kini, oder besser gesagt, ein Wiedergänger von ihm, liegt am Ufer des Starnberger …

posts._title: Eric Rohmer – Les rendez-vous de Paris (1995)
posts.title: Les rendez-vous de Paris
posts.excerpt: Les Rendez-vous de Paris [Rendez-vous in Paris] is a 1995 portmanteau French film directed by Éric Rohmer. Three loosely connected variations on the theme of the lover’s rendezvous in Paris. The three episodes are titled “Le Rendez-vous de 7 heures” (The Rendezvous of 7 hours), in which a student discovers her boyfriend is two-timing her, …

posts._title: Oldrich Lipský – Tajemství hradu v Karpatech AKA The Mysterious Castle In The Carpathians (1981)
posts.title: Tajemství hradu v Karpatech
posts.excerpt: Synopsis: In the 1800s, a baron, who is the owner of a castle known as The Devil’s Castle and who is also an obsessed opera fan, keeps the body of his favorite diva preserved in a crypt in the castle. In order to keep away potentially nosy visitors, the baron’s mad-scientist assistant, invents all sorts …

posts.title: Indecent Desires
posts.excerpt: Description: Blonde (wigged) and beautiful New York City model Sharon Kent (who was also a favorite of Barry Mahon) stars as Ann, a lovely secretary whose life is perfect. Her best friend Babs (middle-aged and buxom Jackie Richards) works with her in a friendly office and her boyfriend Bob recently proposed to her. Her world …

posts._title: Hisayasu Sato – Shisenjiyou no Aria aka The Bedroom (1992)
posts.title: Shisenjiyou no Aria
posts.excerpt: Hisayasu Sato’s THE BEDROOM is a bold, yet flawed film which manages to create an utter sense of depersonalization and loneliness, while still telling a great story. The visuals are great; blue and red light coat the bodies of the comatose girls of The Sleeping Room while giant TVs with constant static decorate the background. …

posts.title: Paprika
posts.excerpt: from imdb.com: Plot Outline: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. “Paprika” is the name given to her by the madam.

posts._title: Patricio Guzmán – Nostalgia de la luz (2010)
posts.title: Nostalgia de la luz
posts.excerpt: In Chile, at three thousand metres altitude, astronomers from all over the world gather together in the Atacama desert to observe the stars. The desert sky is so translucent that it allows them to see right to the boundaries of the universe. It is also a place where the harsh heat of the sun keeps …
